de.tu_darmstadt.gdi1.tanks.tests.adapter
Class TanksTestAdapterMinimal

java.lang.Object
  de.tu_darmstadt.gdi1.tanks.tests.adapter.TanksTestAdapterMinimal
Direct Known Subclasses:
TanksTestAdapterExtended1
public class TanksTestAdapterMinimal
extends java.lang.Object

This is the test adapter for the minimal stage of completion. You must implement the method stubs and match them to your concrete implementation. Please read all the Javadoc of a method before implementing it.
Important: this class should not contain any real game logic, you should rather only match the method stubs to your game.
Example: in isCorrectMap() you may return the value Tanks.isCorrectMap(), if you have a variable Tanks and a map has before been loaded via loadMapFromFile(File). What you mustn't do is to implement the actual logic of the method in this class.

If you have implemented the minimal stage of completion, you should be able to implement all method stubs. The public and private JUnit tests for the minimal stage of completion will be run on this test adapter. The other test adapters will inherit from this class, because they need the basic methods (like loading a map), too.

The methods of all test adapters need to function without any kind of user interaction.
Note: All other test adapters will inherit from this class.

See Also:
TanksTestAdapterExtended1, TanksTestAdapterExtended2, TanksTestAdapterExtended3

getMapElapsedTime

public int getMapElapsedTime()
Returns the elapsed time value parsed from the map file. You don't need to have the timer implemented yet. Just return the the stored value you parsed from the map file. Dies gibt die vergangene Zeit in ms zurueck, welche ueber die Karte eingelesen wurde. Sie muessen den Timer dafuer nicht implementiert haben, geben Sie dann den gespeicherten Wert aus der Kartendatei zurueck.

Returns:
Vergangene Zeit in ms

handleKeyDown

public void handleKeyDown(int updatetime,
                          java.lang.Integer input)
This Method should emulate the key down event. This should make the playertank shoot. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken beliebiger Tasten. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, das Schiessen des Spielerpanzers zu testen)

Parameters:
updatetime - : Zeitdauer bis update-Aufruf
input - : z.B. Input.KEY_K, Input.KEY_L

handleKeyPressed

public void handleKeyPressed(int updatetime,
                             java.lang.Integer input)
This Method should emulate the key pressed event. This should make the playertank shoot. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken beliebiger Tasten. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, das Schiessen des Spielerpanzers zu testen)

Parameters:
updatetime - : Zeitdauer bis update-Aufruf
input - : z.B. Input.KEY_K, Input.KEY_L

handleKeyDownUpArrow

public void handleKeyDownUpArrow()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the up arrow key. (This should make the playertank drive forward.) Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'nach oben'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, waehrend der Tests Gegenstaende wie den Panzer zu bewegen)

handleKeyDownDownArrow

public void handleKeyDownDownArrow()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the down arrow key. This should make the playertank drive backward. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'nach unten'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, waehrend der Tests Gegenstaende wie den Panzer zu bewegen, in diesem Fall eine Rueckwaertsbewegung)

handleKeyDownRightArrow

public void handleKeyDownRightArrow()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the right arrow key. This should make the playertank turn clockwise. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'nach rechts'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, waehrend der Tests Gegenstaende wie den Panzer zu bewegen, hier eine Drehung nach rechts)

handleKeyDownLeftArrow

public void handleKeyDownLeftArrow()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the left arrow key. This should make the playertank turn counter clockwise. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'nach links'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, waehrend der Tests Gegenstaende wie den Panzer zu bewegen, hier eine Drehung nach links)

handleKeyPressK

public void handleKeyPressK()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the k key. This should make the playertank shoot. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'k'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, das Schiessen des Spielerpanzers zu testen)

handleKeyPressN

public void handleKeyPressN()
This Method should emulate the pressing of the n key. This should start a new game. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'k'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, das Spiel neu zu starten)
